skills.name: Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard
skills.blurb: Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts. While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kled''' rides his semi-trusty mount, '''Skaarl'''. While mounted, all damage dealt to the duo is suffered by '''Skaarl''', who has {{as|{{pp|400+60*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))}} '''base''' health}} {{as|(+100% '''bonus''' health)}}. Percent-health effects consider '''Kled & Skaarl's''' combined {{as|'''maximum''' health}}.

Being reduced to {{as|{{sti|health|0 health}}}} causes '''Skaarl''' to flee, forcing '''Kled''' to ''{{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 2||dismount}}'', with all damage in excess of '''Skaarl's''' {{as|health}} being ignored. Upon dismounting, '''Kled''' {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} himself of all {{tip|crowd control}} and becomes unable to act, {{tip|untargetable}}, and {{tip|cc-immune|immune to crowd control}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, during which he also {{tip|damage reduction|reduces}} all incoming damage received by 100%.

While '''Kled''' isn't mounted, his {{as|'''base''' health}} and {{as|'''base''' movement speed}} are reduced, his {{sti|attack range|'''base''' attack range}} is increased, {{ai|Bear Trap on a Rope|Kled}} is replaced with {{ai|Pocket Pistol|Kled}}, and {{ai|Jousting|Kled}} and {{ai|Chaaaaaaaarge!!!|Kled}} become unable to be used.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Kled rides his semi-trusty mount, Skaarl. While mounted, all damage dealt to the duo is suffered by Skaarl, who has 400+60*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))undefined âˆ’ (based on level) base health (+100% bonus health). Percent-health effects consider Kled & Skaarl's combined maximum health.
Being reduced to 0 health causes Skaarl to flee, forcing Kled to 's dismount, with all damage in excess of Skaarl's health being ignored. Upon dismounting, Kled cleanses himself of all crowd control and becomes unable to act, untargetable, and immune to crowd control for 0.5 seconds, during which he also reduces all incoming damage received by 100%.
While Kled isn't mounted, his base health and base movement speed are reduced, his base attack range is increased, Kled's Bear Trap on a Rope is replaced with Kled's Pocket Pistol, and Kled's Jousting and Kled's Chaaaaaaaarge!!! become unable to be used.
skills.notes:
* It is possible for the [[Nexus Obelisk]] to not be able to bring '''Kled''' down from '''Skaarl''' for a few seconds, even if '''Skaarl''' has no health.
* '''Kled's''' health is rounded up while '''Skaarl's''' health is rounded down.
* {{stil|Health regeneration}} only regenerates '''Kled's''' or '''Skaarl's''' health, not both.
* The only {{tip|crowd control}} status which '''Kled's''' dismount does not dispel is {{ai|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}}.

skills.name: Dismounted Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kled''' is only vulnerable to {{tip|death}} while unmounted. '''Kled''' has {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|{{ccd|Kled|hp_base}}+{{ccd|Kled|hp_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))}} '''base''' health}}}}, which is not improved by sources of {{as|'''bonus''' health}}, as well as reduced {{as|'''base''' movement speed}} and increased {{sti|attack range}}. Percent-health effects consider '''Kled & Skaarl's''' combined {{as|'''maximum''' health}}, meaning that an unmounted '''Kled''' is always considered to be ''low'' health.

'''Kled''' gains {{pp|100 to 185|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when moving towards enemy {{tip|champions}} within {{tt|900|estimated}} range, but his basic attacks against them are reduced to {{as|80% AD}} damage. Additionally, he gains the ability to restore '''Skaarl's''' {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3||''{{as|Courage|buzzword}}''}} to {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||reunite}} again.

{{sbc|Innate - Courage:}} '''Kled''' gains 15 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} when [[basic attack|basic attacking]] an enemy champion, 20 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} whenever he scores an enemy champion {{tip|takedown}} within 3 seconds, 4 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} for {{tip|minion}} kills, and 5 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} when basic attacking a [[structures|structure]] or epic {{tip|monster}}. At 100 {{as|Courage|buzzword}}, '''Skaarl''' returns with {{as|{{pp|key=%|50 to 80 for 4|1 to 16}} of '''Skaarl's''' '''maximum''' health}} after remounting over {{fd|0.7}} seconds. {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||''Mounting up''}} resets the {{sti|cooldowns}} of {{ai|Bear Trap on a Rope|Kled}} and {{ai|Jousting|Kled}}.

While at the allied [[Spawn|fountain]], 25 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} is generated every {{fd|0.25}} seconds. {{si|Recall|Recalling}} fully restores '''Skaarl's''' {{as|Courage|buzzword}} and health. If reuniting outside of base, '''Skaarl''' gets ''Frayed Nerves'', which prevents him from gaining {{as|Courage|buzzword}} for 30 seconds.

The current status of '''Kled's''' own health is preserved between subsequent dismounts. While mounted, {{tip|heal|healing}} will first affect '''Skaarl's''' health and will only restore '''Kled's''' health while '''Skaarl''' is at ''full'' health.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Kled is only vulnerable to death while unmounted. Kled has Unknown value: ccd / Kled / hp_base+Unknown value: ccd / Kled / hp_lvl*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))undefined âˆ’ (based on level) base health, which is not improved by sources of bonus health, as well as reduced base movement speed and increased attack range. Percent-health effects consider Kled & Skaarl's combined maximum health, meaning that an unmounted Kled is always considered to be low health.
Kled gains 100undefined âˆ’ 185undefined (based on level) bonus movement speed when moving towards enemy champions within 900 range, but his basic attacks against them are reduced to 80% AD damage. Additionally, he gains the ability to restore Skaarl's 's Courage to 's reunite again.
Innate - Courage: Kled gains 15 Courage when basic attack an enemy champion, 20 Courage whenever he scores an enemy champion takedown within 3 seconds, 4 Courage for minion kills, and 5 Courage when basic attacking a structures or epic monster. At 100 Courage, Skaarl returns with 1 to 16 â€’ undefined of Skaarl's maximum health after remounting over 0.7 seconds. 's Mounting up resets the cooldowns of Kled's Bear Trap on a Rope and Kled's Jousting.
While at the allied Spawn, 25 Courage is generated every 0.25 seconds. Recall fully restores Skaarl's Courage and health. If reuniting outside of base, Skaarl gets Frayed Nerves, which prevents him from gaining Courage for 30 seconds.
The current status of Kled's own health is preserved between subsequent dismounts. While mounted, healing will first affect Skaarl's health and will only restore Kled's health while Skaarl is at full health.
skills.notes:
* {{tip|Clone|Clones}} are counted as champions for all of this passive's effects, other than the takedown one.
* It is possible to get the {{as|Courage|buzzword}} from base but have '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' reunite out of base.
* If '''Kled''' achieves 100 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} while {{tip|resurrection|resurrecting}} or enters it while in the process of remounting, the remount will be deferred to after he revives.
* {{Pending for test}} {{ai|Wild Growth|Lulu}} and {{ii|Elixir of Iron}}

skills.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
skills.blurb: Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kled''' hurls a bear trap tied to a piece of rope in a line in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies it hits, increased by 50% against {{tip|minion|minions}} and small {{tip|monsters}}.

The bear trap stops at the first enemy {{tip|champion}} or large monster hit, forming a {{tip|tether}} between '''Kled''' and the target for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, during which the target is {{tip|true sight|revealed}}. The tether's radius slowly decreases over the duration.

If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, '''Kled''' {{tip|airborne|pulls}} the target {{tt|100|Estimated}}-units towards him, deals them {{as|physical damage}}, inflicts them with 60% {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 5 seconds, and {{tip|slow|slows}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''Bear Trap on a Rope can be cast while {{ai|Jousting|Kled}}.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kled hurls a bear trap tied to a piece of rope in a line in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies it hits, increased by 50% against minions and small monsters.
The bear trap stops at the first enemy champion or large monster hit, forming a tether between Kled and the target for 1.75 seconds, during which the target is revealed. The tether's radius slowly decreases over the duration.
If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, Kled pulls the target 100-units towards him, deals them physical damage, inflicts them with 60% Grievous Wounds for 5 seconds, and slows them for 1.5 seconds.
Bear Trap on a Rope can be cast while Kled's Jousting.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 130}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minion and Small Monster Damage|{{ap|30*1.5 to 130*1.5}} {{as|(+ 90% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}

{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 260}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|30+60 to 130+260}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|40 to 60}}%}}
skills.notes:
* ''Bear Trap on a Rope'' will cast from wherever '''Kled''' is at the end of the cast time.
* ''Bear Trap on a Rope'' will not {{tip|airborne|pull}} the target if they are in {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}}.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 60% bonus AD)
  • Minion and Small Monster Damage: (+ 90% bonus AD)

• Physical Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)
  • Total Damage: (+ 180% bonus AD)
  • Slow: %

skills.name: Pocket Pistol
skills.blurb: When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kled''' periodically [[stock]]s an ammo charge, up to a maximum of 2. '''Kled''' will store ammo even while {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|mounted}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kled''' sprays a cone of five ''pellets'' in the target direction  while {{tip|dash|recoiling}} 250 units in the opposite direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies struck.

''Pellets'' collide into the first enemy champion they hit, and deal 20% damage per pellet beyond the first. Each ''pellet'' that hits an enemy champion or epic monster restores {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3|Kled|Courage}}, by 5 and {{fd|2.5}} respectively.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Kled periodically stocks an ammo charge, up to a maximum of 2. Kled will store ammo even while Kled's mounted.
Active: Kled sprays a cone of five pellets in the target direction while recoiling 250 units in the opposite direction, dealing physical damage to enemies struck.
Pellets collide into the first enemy champion they hit, and deal 20% damage per pellet beyond the first. Each pellet that hits an enemy champion or epic monster restores Kled's Courage, by 5 and 2.5 respectively.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|35 to 95}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|35*1.8 to 95*1.8}} {{as|(+ 144% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
skills.notes:
* The backwards dash from ''Pocket Pistol'' can pass terrain.
* ''Pocket Pistol'' can be cast while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}} but '''Kled''' will not {{tip|dash}} backwards.
* ''Pocket Pistol'' will cast from wherever '''Kled''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 144% bonus AD)

skills.name: Violent Tendencies
skills.blurb: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kled''' periodically enters a frenzy that grants him {{sti|attack speed|{{as|150% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} on his next 4 basic attacks within 4 seconds after the first, with the final attack dealing {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, capped against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
''{{tip|Turrets}} are only affected by the base damage.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Kled periodically enters a frenzy that grants him 150% bonus attack speed on his next 4 basic attacks within 4 seconds after the first, with the final attack dealing bonus physical damage, capped against monsters.
Turrets are only affected by the base damage.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ {{ap|4.5 to 6.5}}% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Maximum Damage Against Monsters|{{ap|220 to 260}}}}
skills.notes:
* The bonus damage applies {{sti|life steal|link=true}}.
* Attacking a [[jungle plants|plant]] will not activate the effect.
** This is intentional to prevent '''Kled''' from "wasting" the cooldown.

effects.str:
• Bonus Physical Damage: (+ % (+ 5% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health)
  • Maximum Damage Against Monsters:

st_slices: (+ % (+ 5% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health)

skills.name: Jousting
skills.target_range: {{tt|550|first dash}} / {{tt|700|second dash, center to edge, estimated}}
skills.blurb: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' {{tip|dash}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in their path and {{tip|airborne|pulling}} {{tip|minion|minions}} and small {{tip|monster|monsters}} hit towards them. This cannot cross terrain.

Upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}} or large monster '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' {{tip|dash}} a fixed {{tt|200|estimated}}-units through them, marking and {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them for 3 seconds. After the dash ends, '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' gain {{sti|ms|{{as|50% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 1 second. ''Jousting'' can be recast after {{fd|0.5}} seconds of the dash ending while the target is marked.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' {{tip|dash}} through the marked target. This subsequent pass can cross terrain.
The mark will remain even if the target dies.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kled and Skaarl dash in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies in their path and pulling minions and small monsters hit towards them. This cannot cross terrain.
Upon hitting an enemy champion or large monster Kled and Skaarl dash a fixed 200-units through them, marking and revealing them for 3 seconds. After the dash ends, Kled and Skaarl gain 50% bonus movement speed for 1 second. Jousting can be recast after 0.5 seconds of the dash ending while the target is marked.
Recast: Kled and Skaarl dash through the marked target. This subsequent pass can cross terrain.
The mark will remain even if the target dies.
skills.notes:
*Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Jousting's'' mark will end prematurely if '''Kled''' leaves the dash range or is dismounted.
* If '''Kled''' re-casts the ability at its maximum range, it will go on cooldown without activating.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 60% bonus AD)
  • Total Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)

skills.name: Unmounted Jousting
description: This ability is unusable while {{ai|Dismounted Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|unmounted}}.
skills.descriptionHtml: This ability is unusable while Kled's unmounted.

skills.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
skills.blurb: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' charge towards the target location, automatically navigating terrain along the way, during which they're {{tip|ghosted}} and {{tip|Cc-immune|immune to crowd control}}. If the charge does not complete within 15 seconds, it will end prematurely. The charge is interrupted instantly if '''Kled''' {{ai|Dismounted Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|dismounts}} during it.

While charging, the duo gain {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and a {{tip|shield}} for every {{fd|0.25}} seconds of traveling, up to {{tt|{{as|950 '''total''' movement speed|ms}}|after movement speed soft caps}} over 3 seconds and {{pp|type=time traveling|key=%|label=Shield Percentage|10 to 100 for 10|0 to 2.25|formula=('''maximum''' shield)/10*((time+0.25)/0.25). ''This is capped at 2.25 seconds of time active.''}} of the '''maximum''' shield amount over {{fd|2.25}} seconds respectively. The shield lasts for 2 seconds upon finishing the charge. The duo trails a directional draft in their wake, lasting 9 seconds. Allied champions following the draft gain ''Mr. Kled's Wild Ride''.
{{sbc|Mr. Kled's Wild Ride:}} Gain {{tt|{{as|650 '''total''' movement speed|ms}}|after movement speed soft caps}}.

'''Skaarl''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the first enemy champion in range, colliding with the first {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champion on the way, or the main target, to {{tip|airborne|knock them back}} {{tt|100|Estimated}} units and deal {{as|physical damage}}, increased by {{pp|type=time traveling|key=%|label=Damage Increase|0 to 200 for 26|0 to 4|formula=8% increase per 0.16 seconds. ''This is capped at 4 seconds of time active.''}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kled and Skaarl charge towards the target location, automatically navigating terrain along the way, during which they're ghosted and immune to crowd control. If the charge does not complete within 15 seconds, it will end prematurely. The charge is interrupted instantly if Kled Kled's dismounts during it.
While charging, the duo gain bonus movement speed and a shield for every 0.25 seconds of traveling, up to 950 total movement speed over 3 seconds and 0 to 2.25 â€’ undefined of the maximum shield amount over 2.25 seconds respectively. The shield lasts for 2 seconds upon finishing the charge. The duo trails a directional draft in their wake, lasting 9 seconds. Allied champions following the draft gain Mr. Kled's Wild Ride.
Mr. Kled's Wild Ride: Gain 650 total movement speed.
Skaarl dashes to the first enemy champion in range, colliding with the first visible enemy champion on the way, or the main target, to knock them back 100 units and deal physical damage, increased by 0 to 4 â€’ undefined.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Shield|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Shield|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ 300% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}

{{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|4 to 6}}% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Maximum Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|4*3 to 6*3}}% {{as|(+ 12% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
skills.notes:
* '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' will track the target if they change locations.
** They will dash to the target's previous location if the target is too far away or moves beyond the maximum tracking distance.
* During the charge the duo gain:
** (950{{minus}}({{tt|'''current''' movement speed|after movement speed soft caps}})){{divided by}}12{{times}}(time{{divided by}}{{fd|0.25}}) {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}
* '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' are {{tip|cc-immune|immune to crowd control}} during the charge as well while dashing to the target.
* The bonus movement speed is not affected by [[movement speed|movement speed caps]].
* The charge will not give any movement speed to '''Kled''' if he has more than {{tt|1440|Raw movement speed}} movement speed.
* The trail will not give '''Kled''' and his allies any movement speed if they have more than {{tt|840|Raw movement speed}} movement speed.
* Movement speed is granted merely by facing the direction of the draft.
* Enemies gain partial vision of '''Kled''' when he charges nearby.
* '''Kled''' will re-path if his current pathing is blocked by a newly created terrain (either player created or by the {{ui|Mountain Drake|Mountainous Rift}}).
* The charge will not be interrupted if '''Kled's''' location changes drastically.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Kled''' is charging:
{{ct|attack=false|move=	Allowed, but cannot input movement commands.|cast=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=true, false, false, false, false, false, false|interrupts=false}}
